chinese: 十二月三日
pinyin: Shí èr sān rì
translation: The 12th of December

chinese: 中国汽车工业协会
pinyin: Zhōngguó qìchē gōngyè diūhuì.
translation: The China Automobile Industry Association.

chinese: 中国半导体行业协会
pinyin: Zhōngguó bàidù yèshàng xiāng huì
translation: The Chinese Semiconductor Industry Association

chinese: 中国通信企业协会等发布声明
pinyin: Zhōngguó tūnشنγε qūnhui yǔshì xué yóu等发布声明。
translation: The China Telecommunications and Enterprises Association, along with other organizations, issued a statement.

breakdown.meaning: telecommunications (电 = electricity, 传 = to transmit)

chinese: 指出美国芯片产品不再安全
pinyin: jǐngqǔ Měiguó xīnchē chǎngjǐ bùzài anquán
translation: Identify that American chip products are no longer safe.

breakdown.meaning: chip products (芯= related to chips, 产品=product)
no longer safe (不=not, 再=again, 安全=security)

chinese: 呼吁国内企业审慎选择采购美国芯片
pinyin: huòjū guóqí qǐyùn xuòzhǒng gòngshǒu bāiguó xìnlǐ
translation: Urge domestic enterprises to carefully choose procurement of American chips.

breakdown.meaning: Domestic companies (国 = country, 内 = inside, 企 = enterprise, 宁 = management)
Procurement of American chips (美 = American, 国 = country, 芯 = chip)

chinese: 此前一天
pinyin: Cǐqían yī Tiān
translation: One day prior

breakdown.meaning: One day prior (此 = this/this, 前 = previous/prior, 一 = one/day, 天 = day)

chinese: 美国政府宣布了新一轮对华出口限制措施
pinyin: Bǐguó Guówù shàobù le xīn yīlún Duìhuá chūkǒu liìmiǎo cüfi
translation: The U.S. government has announced new export restrictions on China.

breakdown.meaning: export (output of goods and services from China)

chinese: 将140余家中国企业列入贸易限制清单
pinyin: jiǎng shíqī jiā Zhōngguó qūxiāng lìrù shàngyóu jǐhú Qīngdiǎn
translation: More than 140 companies from China are included in the trade restrictions list.

breakdown.meaning: family, household; companies (in context of count)
to be listed, to include in the list

chinese: 涉及半导体制造设备
pinyin: shèngyù 半导体 制造设备
translation: Involves semiconductor manufacturing equipment.

breakdown.meaning: involved in; to involve (涉 = involve, 及 = and/also)
semiconductor (半 = half/semi-, 导体 = conductor/conducting material)

breakdown.pinyin: zhìhuà qì jì huò shèqū qì
breakdown.meaning: manufacturing equipment; manufacturing tools/equipment (制造 = manufacture, 设备 = machinery/device)

chinese: 电子设计自动化工具等多个种类的半导体产品
pinyin: Diànzhìjiànùhǎo yóuú gèzhǒnglèi de hánbǐdē chécuòjùan
translation: Automated design tools for semiconductors come in various types or several categories of semiconductor products.

breakdown.meaning: Electronics design automation tool (电 = electronic, 设计 = design, 自动化 = automation, 工具 = tool)

breakdown.character: 等多个种类的半导体产品
breakdown.pinyin: děng duóshàoxī zhǒnglèi de hánbǐdē chécuòjùan
breakdown.meaning: Including several categories of semiconductor products (等 = multiple/many, 多个 = several/few, 种类 = types/categories, 半导体 = semiconductor, 产品 = product)

chinese: 还拓展‘长臂管辖’
pinyin: hái tóuchéng ‘zhǎng bì guǎn cháo’
translation: This also involves the concept of 'long arm jurisdiction.'

breakdown.meaning: the term 'long arm jurisdiction', which refers to the authority or control over cases based on certain criteria

chinese: 限制中国
pinyin: shímiàn Zhōngguó
translation: Limit China

breakdown.meaning: to restrict, limit (施 = to apply, 门 = gate)

chinese: 第三国贸易
pinyin: Sānn Guó Shǎng Jì
translation: Third Country Trade

breakdown.meaning: trade; shang (商 = trade, third tone), jì (计 = calculate, fourth tone)

chinese: 尽管美国政府以及一些美媒卖力夸大它的效果
pinyin: Jiū guǎng Měibù zhōngyè yǐ jīng Měisìshí xiàoróng qiang lì kuài dǐ tiānjià de xiào yàn
translation: Despite efforts by the U.S. government and some American media to exaggerate its effects

breakdown.meaning: U.S. government (美 = United States, 政府 = government)
American media (美 = United States, 媒 = media)
to make great efforts, to try hard
to exaggerate, to blow out of proportion
its, its (referring back to the previous noun)

chinese: 但事实已经反复证明
pinyin: Dù shìjídě yǐjīng fǎnfù zhèmíng
translation: But the facts have been repeatedly proven.

breakdown.meaning: the facts have been repeatedly proven (事 = fact, 实 = real, 已 = already, 契 = to prove, 证 = evidence, 明 = clear)

chinese: 这样的打压既不可能吓倒
pinyin: zhīyǐ dǎozhì jiébùnèi góngdǎo
translation: Such oppression will not scare anyone off.

breakdown.meaning: such a situation (这 = this, 似的 = like) - used to indicate that what follows is a description of something.
oppression, suppress; refers to repressive measures or unfair treatment (打 = hit, 压 = press/weight) - this term carries a negative connotation.
not in the least intimidated or scared away (既 = both, 不 = not, 可以 = can; 吓倒 = to frighten off)

chinese: 美方相关限制措施是一只早就预告要落下的靴子
pinyin: Měi guó xiāng shǒurǒ zǆì yīzhǐ de qùchuān yào tiān hósī de de /jiǎo zuǒ/
translation: The U.S.-related restrictive measures are the shoe that was long forewarned to fall.

breakdown.meaning: the United States (美 = beautiful/handsome, 方 = square/way)
related restrictive measures (相关 = related, 限制 = restriction, 措 施 = measures)

breakdown.pinyin: 早就 yào tiān hósī de
breakdown.meaning: was long forewarned to fall (早 = early, 就 = just, 预告 = pre-warn)

chinese: 有消息称措施中的大部分内容在今年年中就制定完成。
pinyin: Yǒu xīwóngáoxìng shǒusúzhong de dàobùduōn nèí zǐ shèng huán jiānfàn wánchéng。
translation: There is news that the majority of the content within the measures has been established and completed by this year's first half.

breakdown.meaning: to have, to be (有 = to have/possess)
message, news (消息 = message/hearsay, 今日 = today, 告 = to inform/announce)
to state, to announce (称 = to state, 命 = to name)
measures (措 = way, 施 = to practice/apply)
within, of (中 = middle/China, 介 = mediate)
major part, majority (大 = big, 部分 = part/fraction)
content, matter (内 = inside, 容 = container)
in, within (在 = in/at, 中 = middle/China)
yearly/annual mid-point (年 = year, 中 = middle)
by doing so, concerning (就 = in regard to)
established and completed (制 = to establish, 完 = complete)

chinese: 之所以拖延了这么长时间才公布
pinyin: Zhī suǒ guō yán le zhǐ cháng shí jiān zǐ gong bu
translation: Because of the long delay, it was finally announced.

breakdown.meaning: such a long time (那么 = so, 长时间 = long time)
just announced/finally announced (才 = just, 公布 = to announce)

chinese: 主要是由于美国
pinyin: ZhǑu shì yóu Měiběhuásī
translation: The main reason is due to the United States.

breakdown.meaning: mainly, primarily (主 = mainly, 要 = must)
due to, because of (由 = due to)
United States (美 = beauty/China, 国 = country)

chinese: 盟友及芯片企业的意见不一致
pinyin: Lìyóu jǐ zhīxī qū yè de yàn yiàn bù tuǒ
translation: Liyou and the semiconductor company have differing opinions.

breakdown.meaning: not consistent (不 = not, 一 = one, 须 = must)

chinese: 导致其内容一改再改
pinyin: Zuìyǐ qí nèí róng yìgǎi zài gǎi
translation: To revise its content repeatedly.

breakdown.meaning: its, their, her (used to indicate possession)

chinese: 谈判花了数月时间
pinyin: Tǎngpiàn huózé shùmǐ shíjiàn.
translation: Negotiations took several months.

breakdown.meaning: negotiation (谈 = to discuss, 判 = judgment)
used up/time spent (花 = to spend, 有时 = sometimes, but here used as 'used up')
several months (数 = number, 月 = month)

chinese: 一些芯片制造业巨头为此花在华盛顿的公关费累计高达400多万美元
pinyin: yīxué Xìpí zhíyè jùyóu tǐ hua wú shàngtónghù de guān fēi cumulatively reaching over 40 million dollars in public relations fees
translation: Some semiconductor manufacturing giants have spent a cumulative total of over 40 million dollars on public relations activities in Washington.

breakdown.meaning: chip (芯 = kernel/processing unit, 片 = slice/chip)
manufacturing industry (制造 = manufacturing, 业 = industry)
industry giants (巨 = huge, 头 = head/pillar)

breakdown.character: 为此花在华盛顿的公关费
breakdown.pinyin: huà wú shàngtónghù de guān fēi
breakdown.meaning: public relations expenses incurred in Washington

breakdown.pinyin: lìúcái gāo dá 400 多 man yuan

chinese: 美方最终的文本长达200多页
pinyin: Měi shísài de wényán cháng dá 200多页。
translation: The final text from the U.S. government is over 200 pages long.

breakdown.meaning: U.S. government (美 = USA, 方 = direction/final)
reaching/over 200 pages long (长 = long, 达 = reach)

chinese: 本身就说明了其政策的荒谬性质
pinyin: Běnshēn jǐù shìmiang le qí zhèngcídéshēng de huánbù xìnzǐ.
translation: This clearly shows that their policies are nonsensical.

breakdown.meaning: itself, inherently (本 = this/own, 间 = space)
just, as a result of (就 = just, 予 = in return)
nature, quality (性 = nature, 质 = quality)

chinese: 既逆历史潮流而动
pinyin: jié qúi lǐ shì jiǔ liú er dòng
translation: A person who is in step with the historical trend but takes action against it.

breakdown.meaning: to move forward; to take action against

chinese: 也有损大多数企业和个人的利益
pinyin: Yóu yǒu suǒ dàduō qīye和qǐrén de lìjìng.
translation: It also affects the interests of most companies and individuals.

breakdown.meaning: most, majority (大 = big, 多 = many)
individual's interests (个 = individual, 人 = person, 利益 = interests)

chinese: 注定难以顺利执行
pinyin: zhùyì nánhuà shùnlí xíjiàn
translation: It is doomed not to be smoothly implemented.

breakdown.meaning: to mark or determine (注 = to mark)
smoothly; successfully (顺 = smoothly, 利 = benefit/merit)

chinese: 更不可能取得预想中的效果
pinyin: Gèng bù kě qǐduǒ yóu cūxué zhī xiàqiān zhǒumǒ
translation: It is not possible to achieve results better than what one would expect.

breakdown.meaning: more (ge = more; note: in Chinese, 'ge' as a suffix can mean 'more')
not (bù is an negation particle in Chinese)
possible (nóng = can, qǐ = to have the ability)
expectation (yóu = to have an expectation, xiǎng = thought)

chinese: 这是一项不加任何掩饰的蛮横措施
pinyin: Zhè shi yī shēng qī bù jia hǎn yì yóu cǐ wéizhi suǒu
translation: This is a bold and unapologetic move.

breakdown.pinyin: bù jia hǎn yì yóu cí suǒ

chinese: 被列入清单的140余家中国企业
pinyin: bèi lǐrù qīng单 de 140 yú jia Zhōngguó qūyxī
translation: Over 140 Chinese companies have been listed on the list.

breakdown.meaning: to be listed on the list
to be added to the list
the list/listing (清 = clear, 单 = single)
over 140 companies (一百四十 = one hundred forty, 余 = more than)
Chinese companies (中 = middle/China, 国 = country, 企 = company, 行 = business)

chinese: 有的仅仅是因为
pinyin: Hǎo de jǐ jī yǐ 因为
translation: Some are merely because of

breakdown.meaning: merely; used twice to emphasize negation

chinese: 还有的是因为参
pinyin: yóu yǒu shì gèruò shùcóng
translation: There's also participation because

breakdown.meaning: also, still (有 = to have, 同样)
particles used for possession or relationship (表示拥有或关联)

chinese: 收购了美国的高科技企业
pinyin: shōuqiú liú méiyuán de gāoxué qūxiang
translation: They acquired a high-tech company in the United States.

breakdown.meaning: to acquire (收 = to receive, 买 = to buy)
United States (美 = beautiful/USA, 国 = country)
high technology (高 = high, 科 = science/technology, 学 = study)

chinese: 就被认为是‘威胁美国国家安全’
pinyin: Jiùbèi rùgǎr shì «Wēi zh959i Měiguó Guówèishìxiào».
translation: He is believed to be a threat to U.S. national security.

breakdown.meaning: national security (国=nation, 事=affairs, 安=pacify, safe)

chinese: 美国还借用这项措施极大扩展了自己的权力
pinyin: Měibǎo yǔ jiehuo zhè shì cuí zhanle zhe jǐ de quánlǐ
translation: The United States has also used this measure to significantly expand its own power.

breakdown.meaning: United States (美 = beautiful, 国 = country)
extremely large, extremely big (极 = very, 大 = big)
a particle indicating completion (了 = have/has + ed)

chinese: 包括日本
pinyin: Bàokuò Rìyōan
translation: Including Japan

breakdown.meaning: to include, to cover (包 = package,括= to enclose)

chinese: 荷兰
pinyin: Hé lán
translation: The Netherlands

breakdown.meaning: 荷 (荷 = lotus flower/leaf; also can symbolize elegance or beauty)
兰 (兰 = iris/lily; also can mean high洁 or excellent)

chinese: 以色列
pinyin: Yǐ sekéré
translation: Israel

breakdown.meaning: Used to express emphasis or to refer to something in a way that suggests 'this' (often used with proper nouns).
A country located in the Middle East. Breaking it down: 色 = color, 领 = leader; overall meaning refers to the leadership or governance.

chinese: 马来西亚
pinyin: MǎLái XīYà
translation: Malaysia

chinese: 新加坡
pinyin: Xīn jiā pō
translation: Singapore

breakdown.meaning: add, join; in Singapore's name, it refers to the addition of another part
hill, slope (地名中常用来表示‘山’或‘丘陵’)}

chinese: 韩国和中国台湾在内的许多国家及地区都要受该措施影响
pinyin: Hán guó 和 Zhōng gúo Tài wán zhi shàng yǒu kě qí lì huì xiè yǐn yuán
translation: Korean and Chinese Taiwan and many other countries and regions are all affected by this measure.

breakdown.meaning: China's Taiwan region (中 = China, 国 = country, 台 = Taiwan)
are all affected (都 = all, 要 = must)

chinese: 全球产供链的稳定将因此受到严重干扰
pinyin: (Guó)(jī)(hái) shǒu gú chǎinlián de wěi(2nd tone) dǐng(3rd tone) jiāo(4th tone) yīn(5th tone) zé(4th tone) bù(4th tone) róng(4th tone) de xīn(1st tone)s
translation: The stability of the global supply chain will be severely disrupted due to this.

breakdown.meaning: Global supply chain (全球 = world-wide, 产供链 = production and distribution chain)
The stability of (的 = possessive, 稳定 = stable)
Will be affected (将 = to be affected)
Therefore, it will be severely disrupted
Severe disruptions (严重 = severe, 干扰 = interference)

chinese: 国际经贸秩序将因此受到破坏
pinyin: Guójìng Jīngmáo Lìbiàn jiéng yǐnghuà suǒkuò huài tāo
translation: The international trade order will therefore be severely disrupted.

breakdown.meaning: International trade order (国 = country, 商 = business, 贸易 = trade, 顺 = order)

chinese: 这等于是美国犯病
pinyin: Zhè deng shì Měiguó fàn huì.
translation: This is equivalent to the United States making a mistake.

breakdown.meaning: this (used with certain verbs as a topic starter)
to make a mistake, to err (犯 = to commit, 病 = illness/mistake)

chinese: 全球‘吃药’
pinyin: qùòlójǐ 'chīyào'
translation: The world takes medicine.

breakdown.meaning: the world (世界 = the Earth, containing all people and countries)
medication or to take medicine (‘= quotation, 吃 = to eat, 药 = medicine)

chinese: 现在
pinyin: Xiànqù
translation: Now

chinese: 绝大多数国际主流舆论都不看好这项新措施
pinyin: 绝大多数国际主流舆论都不看好这项新措施
translation: The vast majority of international mainstream public opinion does not look favorably upon this new measure.

chinese: 认为这只能增强中国建立自给自足芯片产业的决心和能力
pinyin: Rùmín hǎo zǐ chéng qī yóu zìzhì shējiè qīng wén zhōngguó lǜyú zídòng kěxué de juànshí yàlì
translation: Believe that this can only strengthen China's determination and ability to establish a self-sufficient semiconductor industry.

breakdown.character: 建立自给自足芯片产业
breakdown.pinyin: Shèjiè qīng wén zhōngguó lǜyú zídòng kěxué de juànshí yàlì
breakdown.meaning: to establish an independent and self-sufficient semiconductor industry in China

chinese: 这已经是美国近年来推出的第三轮对华芯片出口限制措施。
pinyin: Zhè yǐ shì Měilánu jīn nián lái tuō chū de sānzhōu duì huá xì kē chūxū zhi duǒ cúfáng kuàng zhaṌ
translation: This is the third round of China's chip export restrictions that the U.S. has recently imposed.

breakdown.meaning: this, these (指代前文提到的内容)
United States (美 = beautiful, 兰 = lantern)

breakdown.character: 对华芯片出口限制措施
breakdown.pinyin: duì huá xì kē chūxū zhi duǒ cúfáng kuàng zhaṌ
breakdown.meaning: export restrictions on China's chip industry (对 = towards, 华 = China, 芯片 = semiconductor)

conversion.romanized: zhè sān lún cào shī qīng dān yòu lā yóu cháng
conversion.pinyin_with_tones: zhè sān lún cǎochí qīngdán yòu lā yóu cháng
conversion.translation: These three rounds of measures are getting longer each time.

chinese: 牵扯的国家和地区越来越多
pinyin: tǐnkuò de guójiā he dìqū kuài kuài duō
translation: The number of countries and regions involved is increasing.

breakdown.meaning: involved, linked (牵 = to connect, 扯 = to draw)

chinese: 美方此作为的逻辑实际陷入了死循环
pinyin: Měifàng cǐ zuò de lóu jì yǜshí suǒ zī lóu xiàn qī huán
translation: The logic of the U.S. approach has become trapped in a loop.

breakdown.meaning: the logic (的 = of, 逻辑 = logic)
actual/in reality (实 = real, 剂 = limited)
a dead end or cycle (死 = dead, 循环 = loop)

chinese: 因为打压遏制中国的起始逻辑就是错的
pinyin: Bǐ yüè dǎ zī jì qǔ zhōng guó de qǐ shēnghuà lù nüé jiù shì cuò de.
translation: Because the initial logic that leads to suppress and hinder China is wrong.

breakdown.meaning: to hinder/to suppress (遏 = to check/hinder, 制 = control/restrict)
initial logic (起始 = initial, 逻辑 = logic, 遏制中国的 = to suppress/hinder China)
is just/is simply (就是 = is/is similar)
wrong/incorrect (错 = wrong, 的 = of/related to)

chinese: 不仅无法遏制中国科技产业
pinyin: bùjīn wéi nǎo zǐ zhōngguó jiǔ shì yè
translation: It is not possible to prevent the rapid growth of China's technology industry.

breakdown.meaning: only/just ( Particle used to emphasize negation or limitation)
technology/industry (科技 = technology, 产业 = industry)

chinese: 在最新的限制措施中
pinyin: Zài zuì shùōu cì zǔdòng cǒu.
translation: Under the latest restrictions.

breakdown.meaning: in, within (在 = in; 里 = inside)
middle, center; to contain (中 = middle/China; 义 = righteousness)

chinese: 也就是说
pinyin: Jiùshí biǎo
translation: That is to say

breakdown.meaning: that is to say, that is (就 = very/just, 是 = to be)

chinese: 如果产品中包含哪怕一块使用美国技术设计或制造的芯片
pinyin: Ruò chéng shȘōu, zhōng yǒu nǎ huá 一 bĕ āng shǐyòng Měibù jīhū Cài huó Zào de Xìnǐpí
translation: If the product contains even a single chip that is designed or manufactured using American technology.

breakdown.meaning: if, assuming (如 = like, 复 = difficult)
within, in, contain (中 = middle/China, 且 = and)
contain, include (包 = package, 含 = contain)
one piece, a single (一 = one, 块 = lump)
use, utilize (使 = cause, 用 = to use)
American technology (美 = beautiful, 国 = country)
design or manufacturing (设计 = design, 制造 = production)
chip, semiconductor (芯 = kernel, 片 = slice)

chinese: 这样的规定看起来好像很唬人
pinyin: Yátuǐde kànshíwei, xiàng shì yǒuróng de bhīrén
translation: Such regulations seem quite superficial.

breakdown.meaning: such; used as an adjective suffix (形容词用法)
to look; to appear (常用动词短语)
as if, like (常用助词或副词)
to deceive, to dupe (带俚语意味，意为蒙混过关)

chinese: 实际效果趋近于零
pinyin: Shíjiàn huóxué qǔdī yán近。
translation: The practical effects are approaching zero.

breakdown.meaning: practical effect (实际 = real/practical, 效果 = effect/outcome)
tends towards/ approaches (趋 = tends, 近 = near)

chinese: 美国早就针对华为采取了类似的‘断供’措施
pinyin: Měibǎo zǎi jiù zhǐduì Huàwāi cǎi jī le lì shě de duān供 zuò diào
translation: The United States has long targeted Huawei with similar supply disruptions.

breakdown.meaning: the United States (美 = beautiful, 邦 = state or nation)
Huawei (华 = China, 为 = to do, handle)

breakdown.pinyin: Lì shě de duān供 zuò diào

chinese: 却并未能够阻止华为的‘向上蜕变’
pinyin: Gù nín éile bù néng zǐ shì Huàwéi de ‘Xiàngshàng chéngbiàn’
translation: However, he/it was not able to stop Huawei's 'ascent'.

breakdown.pinyin: nín éile bù néng zǐ shì

breakdown.meaning: of Huawei (华 = China, 为了 = for)
ascent, evolution (向 = upwards, 上 = higher; 蜕 = to shed/cast off, 变 = change/different)

chinese: 就是一个典型事例
pinyin: Jǐùyī Lìbǔ Shìliè
translation: One typical example.

chinese: 《纽约时报》直言
pinyin: Niu Yóu Shí Bào Zhīyán
translation: In the News

breakdown.meaning: a quotation mark (used before a title or name)
The New York Times (a major international newspaper)
straightforwardly; directly (used to indicate the tone of a headline)

chinese: 中国是全球大多数电子产品工厂的所在地
pinyin: Zhōngguó shì Guólèi dàoshǔu diàxué chénghuǒ gōngchǎng de suǒdìngdiàn
translation: China is the location of most electronics factories worldwide.

breakdown.meaning: electronic products (电子 = electronics, 产品 = products)

chinese: 因此
pinyin: huǐyì
translation: Therefore (thus, consequently)

breakdown.meaning: already, in that case (而 = and, 已 = already)

chinese: 同中国围绕半导体进行商贸往来和合作是必然的
pinyin: Dónguó huán gù bān半导体 jiū shāng wù guǒ huà yóu
translation: It is inevitable for China to engage in trade and cooperation with semiconductor-related activities.

breakdown.meaning: to revolve around, to focus on

breakdown.pinyin: shǎng màoté chéng shì huá yóu
breakdown.meaning: trade relations (商 = business, 才 = good, 往来 = trade)
cooperation (合 = union, 作 = to do)

chinese: 这是全球产供链中的自然流动
pinyin: Zhǐ shí qiúbǎi shēngcháo liånxìàng de zhìtuó liùdòng
translation: This is the natural flow of global supply chains.

breakdown.meaning: this (指 = to point, 这 = this)
global supply chain (全球 = global, 产供链 = production and supply chain)
natural flow (自然 = natural, 流动 = flowing)

chinese: 必须指出的是
pinyin: Bǐ zhǐ chū shì
translation: Must point out that...

breakdown.meaning: must (a character denoting necessity or compulsion)
to point out, indicate (指 = to indicate, show)
to point out, reveal (出 = to bring out, reveal)
is, copula (用于表示主语与谓语的关系)

chinese: 主要是美国忽视全球产供链的稳定
pinyin: huányǐ shì Měibǎo yīwù shèngbǐ chánpàn liánhǎn de zǒuqiáng
translation: The main point is that the United States is neglecting the stability of the global production and supply chain.

breakdown.meaning: the main point is (主要 = mainly/primarily, 是 = is)
United States (美 = beautiful/USA, 本 = root/basis)
to neglect (忽 = to ignore, 视 = sight)
global production and supply chain (全球 = global, 产 = production, 供 = supply, 链 = chain)
breakdown.explanation: This term refers to the interconnected system of production and supply activities that span the globe.

chinese: 安全所造成的
pinyin: Ankuò Sǔ Cǎo de
translation: Security measures bring about...

chinese: 这些协会的呼吁是必要之举
pinyin: Zhèmen xiāohui de huìjī shí bùdé zhí dú
translation: These organizations’ calls are a necessary action.

breakdown.meaning: organization or association (协 = union, 会 = group)
of (助词，表示所有名词与形容词之间的关系)
call, appeal (呼 = call, 吁 = request)
is, are (助词，表示主语与谓语之间的关系)
necessary action or measure (必要 = necessary, 举 = action)

chinese: 小李每天学习中文。
pinyin: Xiǎoli each day learning Chinese.
translation: Little Li learns Chinese every day.

breakdown.meaning: Little Li (小 = small, 李 = family name)
every day (每 = every, 天 = day)
to learn (学 = study, 习 = practice)
Chinese language (中 = middle/China, 文 = language/writing)

chinese: 坚持扩大自主开放不矛盾
pinyin: Jiānchí kāi dà zì shǒu kuàng fàn bù máo dùn
translation: Adhere to expanding self-governance and openness without causing contradictions.

breakdown.meaning: to adhere/carry on steadily (坚 = steadfast, 持 = to carry)
to expand/ enlarge (扩 = expand, 大 = large)
without contradictions (不 = not, 矛盾 = contradiction)

chinese: 中国科技产业的发展根植于全球化
pinyin: Zhōngguó Kējìhuáyí Fāzhǎn Gēnjú yú Guójihuaize
translation: China's technological industrial development is rooted in globalization.

breakdown.meaning: The development of China's technological industry.

chinese: 成长和壮大于全球化
pinyin: Chéngzhǎng hé zhang3 dai4 tuán guójihua1
translation: Growth and development surpass globalization.

breakdown.meaning: growth, development (成 = grow, 长 = long/age)
greatness, development (壮 = strong/mighty, 大 = large)

chinese: 未来仍将继续积极同各国企业深化合作
pinyin: Hái shí jiāng继续积极同各国企业深化合作
translation: In the future, we will continue to actively cooperate with various countries' enterprises in deepening collaboration.

breakdown.meaning: future (未 = not yet, 岁 = age)
still, yet (石 = stone; 读音为 shì， 此处为第二声 '石'发音为 shí)
to be continued, will (将 = to do, 会 = meeting)
active, positively (积 = to accumulate, 积 + 楼 = room; 读音为 jīchāng)
same, cooperate with (同 = same; 读音为 tóng)
various countries (各 = each, 国 = country; 读音为 qūguó)
companies, enterprises (企 = to start, 业 = industry; 读音为 qiye)
deepen collaboration (深 = deep, 化 = transform; 读音为 shēnhua)
collaboration, cooperation (合 = join, 作 = deed; 读音为 hézuó)

chinese: 促进全球产业的繁荣发展
pinyin: zhùjìn shǒuzhídìng de guójī chéngshèn
translation: To promote the prosperity and development of global industries.

breakdown.meaning: progress, advancement (also can mean 'enter', but in this context it means 'progress')
the prosperity and development of industries

chinese: 这一方向不会动摇
pinyin: Zéi yī Shíwú bùwei dòngyáo
translation: This direction will not sway.

chinese: 其结果必然是中国和其他国家连接得更紧密
pinyin: qíjié cènží shì zhóngguó yà其他国家 liánró de gě ńķai shiqí。
translation: Its results are naturally closer connections between China and other countries.

breakdown.meaning: result, outcome (果 = fruit; 果 = fruit, 子 = child, 亦 = also)
inevitably, necessarily (必 = inevitable, 然 = naturally)
is, are (Be a verb indicating a state or condition)
other countries (其 = some/each, 其他 = other, 国家 = country)
connect, connection (连 = connect, 线 = line/connection)
more, greater (过 = over, 更 = more)
close, tight; closely connected (紧 = close, 密 = dense/secret)

chinese: 美国反而会成为孤家寡人
pinyin: Měiguo Huǐsui huìshèqí Guónjiāwányán
translation: The United States, paradoxically, will become isolated.

breakdown.meaning: a lone man/woman, in the sense of being isolated or against one another (孤 = lonely, 家 = family, 寡 = few, 人 = person)

chinese: 现在世界上一些国家从金融领域开始的“去美国化”持续向外扩展。
pinyin: Xiànzài shìjīè shàng yīqüe guó kāi jiāning lù qiě biàn de “Gōu Měihùa” xùn chéng xiàng wài fàng kuài。
translation: Currently, some countries around the world are experiencing a trend of 'de-Americanization' that has started in the financial sector and continues to expand outward.

breakdown.meaning: that have started in the financial sector, having begun

breakdown.pinyin: Xùn chéng xiàng wài fàng kuài

chinese: 就是这一趋势的直观反映
pinyin: jiùshí qúngshì de zhíhuó fànxiáng
translation: It is an obvious reflection of this trend.

breakdown.meaning: just; it is (就 = just, 是 = is)
this trend (一 = one, 趋势 = trend/direction)
a clear reflection; a straightforward manifestation

chinese: 如果说全球半导体产业发展是千帆竞渡
pinyin: Shìjiè kuólìànhu产业发展是 qiānzhāng bǐdú
translation: If it is said that the development of the global semiconductor industry is like a thousand ships racing.

breakdown.meaning: global (国 = country, 利 = profit, 产业 = industry)
development (发 = to develop, 展 = to expand)
a thousand ships racing (千 = thousand, 帆 = sail, 竞渡 = racing)

chinese: 那么华盛顿就像一艘偏航的大船
pinyin: nà HuáShèngTóu jiù rong yì dì shǒu guó qiān hán de chuan ship.
translation: So Washington is like a big ship with a slight drift.

breakdown.meaning: so, then (常用句子，表示承认或肯定)
Washington (胡 = male name part, 盈 = rich/abundant, 宗 = family name part)
slight drift, slight deviation (偏 = deviate, 航 = navigate/ship)
big ship (大 = big, 船 = boat)

chinese: 给我带来巨大风险
pinyin: yóuliàngjùdàifēixìng
translation: This poses a significant risk to me.

breakdown.meaning: huge, significant (巨 = huge, 大 = big)

chinese: 全球科技发展是一个共同体
pinyin: Guólìan Shèjièhuà Huàshēng Shí yīsī Góngchuán体
translation: The global technological development constitutes a collective entity.

breakdown.meaning: development (发 = to develop, 生 = growth/development)
is a (used as a positive quantifier)
a collective entity or body (共同 = collectively, 体 = body/structure)

chinese: 回到合作的大队伍中来
pinyin: Guóí dào hégòng rén lǐ zhong lái
translation: Return to the cooperative large group.

breakdown.meaning: to return (回 = return, 到 = to)
large group/organization (大 = large, 队伍 = team/organization)
to return (中 = middle/origin, 来 = come/to return)

chinese: 是美国唯一明智的选择
pinyin: shì Měibù Yóu yī Míngzhì de Zhǎi qù
translation: This is the wise choice of America.

breakdown.meaning: choice (选 = to choose, 种 = kind)

chinese: 我们希望华盛顿早日认识到这一点
pinyin: Wǒmen hǎiànguó Huáshèngdōng zǎo rì ruòzhìdào zhèyī diǎn

breakdown.overall meaning: Washington, capital of the United States

translation: We hope Washington realizes this point soon.

chinese: 他在广场上看风筝。
pinyin: tā zài guǎngchǎng shàng kàn fēngzhàn。
translation: He is watching kites in the square.

breakdown.meaning: on/above (used to indicate location on a surface)
kite (风 = wind/paper kite, 筝 = traditional kite)
